page.title: 17SPRINGFIELD SCHOOL
page.content: Ours is a special school.It belongs to Leeds City Council.A few years ago it belonged to the{West Riding {County Council.}Springfield used to be a convalescent home for the work- -people of Leeds.It was built in 1906. In 1952 it became a boarding school for pupils from the West Riding of Yorkshire. {In 1952 there were 60 {pupils,30 girls,30 boys. In 1985{there are only 20 pupils, 4 girls and 16 boys.We all come from Leeds now.Mr Kirby is our Head Teacher There are 4 teachers.Mrs Holt is our Matron.There are 4 house parents. The school grounds are looked after by Community Industries. The six children in Miss Heald's class are Sharon Smith,Leslie Stuart, Wendy Wilkinson,Samantha Leach,Craig Waterson and me and we all helped to do the survey.{BY GEOFFREY BOWIE.
